title: Duke’s Beautiful Tailor - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   European Ambience   Family Business   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   R-18   Short Story
author: Yuchaehwa   유채화
description:
The most famous dress room in the capital, but on the brink of bankruptcy, [Knight’s Book]. The only way for Helena, the owner’s daughter, to protect the shop is to take orders from the only duke in the kingdom! Although she is second to none in terms of her skills, she is troubled because she has no career to show off. ‘The Duke , are you really handsome?’

Her only wish was to protect the [Book of Knights] but

Falling in love with the duke ‘s beauty, the desire to try on clothes made by himself Only Helena is engulfed. As I scan his body for measurements, I can’t help but feel an unspeakable reaction. “You were very special. The daring lady who appeared with her hair cut short and rubbed my body here and there with a casual face You were the first.”

“Hey, you’re rubbing my body here and there!” The duke  who speaks smirk with his pretty lips Helena from Can you safely receive the order>
